main.name: Yihan Zhou
main.bio:
Hi, I’m Yihan (Jojo) Zhou, a results-driven Web Developer and aspiring Data Analyst based in Perth.
I have solid experience in front-end development using React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Ant Design, and I’ve also worked on API integration and data visualization with tools like SQL, Tableau, and Power BI.
My background spans product support and analysis, from building responsive applications to optimizing user journeys and processes.
Currently, I’m completing my Professional Year Program while sharpening my data analysis skills, with a goal of combining technical expertise and analytical thinking to deliver practical, data-driven solutions.

education.degree: Bachelor of Information and Computing Science

work.title: Product Assistant (Full-time)
work.description: Supported the development and optimization of the company’s Demand-Side advertising platform (DSP) and ad slot management modules. Built and maintained dashboards to monitor metrics and enable data-driven decisions. Identified workflow logic issues and collaborated with engineers to deliver code-level fixes and platform iterations. Conducted user-path testing, documented defects, and proposed actionable improvements. Analyzed user behavior data to optimize UX and improve platform profitability.

work.title: Web Developer (Internship)
work.description: Contributed to the development of a Teacher Course Management System for course creation, scheduling, and progress tracking. Built dynamic pages with React.js and Next.js, ensuring scalability and performance. Developed reusable UI components using Ant Design and Tailwind CSS. Integrated APIs for authentication, data handling, and real-time updates. Supported debugging and release testing to ensure high-quality delivery.

work.title: Product Manager (Internship)
work.description: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance the HAGO social platform. Utilized SQL to track events and user journeys, detecting drop-offs and abnormal behaviors to inform fixes. Performed path testing and bug reporting, providing engineering teams with prioritized issue logs. Assisted in the design, optimization, and UAT of an AI-based auto-reply tool, improving response efficiency.
